51#ifndef AM_MULTI_BOOT_H
52#define AM_MULTI_BOOT_H
53
54#include "am_mcu_apollo.h"
55#include "am_util_bootloader.h"
56
57// All functions return 0 on success
58typedef int (*flash_read_func_t)(uint32_t ui32DestAddr, uint32_t *pSrc, uint32_t ui32Length);
59typedef int (*flash_write_func_t)(uint32_t ui32DestAddr, uint32_t *pSrc, uint32_t ui32Length);
60typedef int (*flash_erase_func_t)(uint32_t ui32Addr);
61typedef int (*flash_init_func_t)(void);
62typedef int (*flash_deinit_func_t)(void);
63typedef int (*flash_enable_func_t)(void);
64typedef int (*flash_disable_func_t)(void);
65
66typedef struct
67{
68 // Granularity for Write
69 // Should be power of 2
70 uint32_t flashPageSize;
71 // Granularity for Erase
72 // Should be power of 2
73 uint32_t flashSectorSize;
74 // Initialize the flash device
75 flash_init_func_t flash_init;
76 // De-Initialize the flash device
77 flash_deinit_func_t flash_deinit;
78 // Enable (Power up) the flash device
79 flash_enable_func_t flash_enable;
80 // Disable (Put in Low power mode) the flash device
81 flash_disable_func_t flash_disable;
82 // Read a block of data from within a flash page
83 flash_read_func_t flash_read_page;
84 // Read a block of data within a flash page
85 flash_write_func_t flash_write_page;
86 // Erase the flash sector corresponding to address specified
87 flash_erase_func_t flash_erase_sector;
88} am_util_multiboot_flash_info_t;
89
90#define OTA_INFO_OPTIONS_EXT_FLASH 0x1
91#define OTA_INFO_OPTIONS_DATA 0x2
92#define OTA_INFO_MAGIC_NUM 0xDEADCAFE
93typedef struct
94{
95 // Should be set to OTA_INFO_MAGIC_NUM
96 uint32_t magicNum;
97 // Address in flash where the new image should be programmed
98 uint32_t *pui32LinkAddress;
99 // Length of image blob
100 uint32_t ui32NumBytes;
101 // CRC of the image blob
102 uint32_t ui32ImageCrc;
103 // (Optional) Security Info length
104 uint32_t secInfoLen;
105 // Options - e.g. Read from external flash device
106 uint32_t ui32Options;
107 // (optional) Security Information location
108 uint32_t *pui32SecInfoPtr;
109 // Location of image blob - Address needs to be aligned to 4 Byte address
110 uint32_t *pui32ImageAddr;
111 // CRC to confirm integrity of the OTA Descriptor structure
112 uint32_t ui32Crc;
113} am_util_multiboot_ota_t;
114
115typedef void (*invalidate_ota_func_t)(am_util_multiboot_ota_t *pOtaInfo);
116
117// Internal flash info and handlers
118extern am_util_multiboot_flash_info_t g_intFlash;
119
120extern bool am_util_multiboot_init(uint32_t *pBuf, uint32_t bufSize);
121
122extern void am_util_multiboot_uart_isr_handler(uint32_t ui32Module);
123extern uint32_t am_util_multiboot_uart_detect_baudrate(uint32_t ui32RxPin);
124extern void am_util_multiboot_setup_serial(int32_t i32Module, uint32_t ui32BaudRate);
125
126extern void am_util_multiboot_ios_acc_isr_handler(void);
127extern void am_util_multiboot_setup_ios_interface(uint32_t interruptPin);
128extern void am_util_multiboot_cleanup_ios_interface(void);
129
130// pExtFlash - can be NULL if using internal flash
131// pTempBuf should point to a memory big enough to hold one flash sector (int or ext) worth of data
132extern bool am_util_multiboot_ota_handler(am_util_multiboot_ota_t *pOtaInfo, uint32_t *pTempBuf,
133 uint32_t tempBufSize, invalidate_ota_func_t invalidateOtaFunc,
134 am_util_multiboot_flash_info_t *pExtFlash);
135
136extern bool am_util_multiboot_check_boot_from_flash(bool *pbOverride, am_util_bootloader_image_t **ppsImage);
137extern bool am_util_multiboot_get_main_image_info(uint32_t *pui32LinkAddr, uint32_t *pui32Length);
138
139#endif // AM_MULTI_BOOT_H
140
